greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permutation of natural numbers, the odd bisection of A245605 incremented by one and halved: a(n) = (1+A245605((2*n)-1))/2.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10001
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: As a composition of related permutations:
program: A064989(n) = my(f = factor(n)); for(i=1, #f~, if((2 == f[i,1]),f[i,1] = 1,f[i,1] = precprime(f[i,1]-1))); factorback(f);
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jul 30 2014
